@graph.description:
Tools to extract information from the
    Intergovernmental Organizations ('IGO') Database , version 3, provided
    by the Correlates of War Project <https://correlatesofwar.org/>. See
    also Pevehouse, Jon C.W., Timothy Nordstron, Roseanne W McManus, Anne
    Spencer Jamison, "Tracking Organizations in the World: The Correlates
    of War 'IGO' Version 3.0 datasets", Journal of Peace Research
    <doi:10.1177/0022343319881175>. Version 3 includes information from
    1815 to 2014.
@graph.name: igoR: Intergovernmental Organizations Database
